title: Fidget Creator 1.1 Released
shortContent: The Creator tool now supports importing existing .fidget files and velocity previews.
fullContent:
The Fidget Creator has been upgraded to version 1.1! You can now:

  • Import existing .fidget files
  • Preview spinner velocity in real-time
  • Toggle advanced metadata controls

Give it a try at /create!

title: News System Now Online
shortContent: This very page loads news directly from a JSON feed so we can update easily and often!
fullContent:
We just added a dynamic news system. This means:

  • No page rebuilds to post updates
  • Fully JSON-powered layout
  • Expandable previews and inline links

We’ll post tips, patch notes, and featured creations here—so check back often!
